featured.text: Between the 12th and 15th centuries, trade increased between Arabia, Persia, and Zanzibar, bringing the archipelago both wealth and power.
In 1499, he arrived at Zanzibar, an archipelago sitting at the crossroads of the Spice Route.

definition.zh_def: 群島；由多個島嶼組成的地區。
definition.example: The Philippines is an archipelago consisting of over 7,000 islands.
